alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Pope; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:59AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pope, northeastern Swift and northern Kandiyohi Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Murdock, or 19 miles northwest of Willmar, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willmar, New London and Spicer. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 66 and 79. U.S. Highway 8 in Minnesota near mile marker 6. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 117 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Minnesota.
